Talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>It's because of your efforts that Gerudo
Town is back to normal. Sarqso.

And now it's our turn to help you return
your home to normal too!

Stay focused on accomplishing your
goals. You have our support.
Talk_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_01>It's because of your efforts that Gerudo
Town is back to normal. Sarqso.

And now it's our turn to help you return
your home to normal too!

<snd:TalkPositive_01>The person in charge here, Purah, said
she saw Zelda.

Stay focused on accomplishing your
goals. We'll keep this place safe.
talk0014:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>Yiga Clan?! We don't need any help from
you. Scurry on back to Karusa Valley.

That's right. I know all about your hideout
in the Gerudo Highlands, and once I'm
finished with my duties here...
<sp:3:0:2:0900>I'll be coming to crush your little enclave.
Talk_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>If you're looking for gems, I hear <clr:0000>Goron
City<clr:ffff>, up near Death Mountain, is a great
source for ones that aren't too pricey.
Curious how I know about this? Well,
we Gerudo have a sharp eye for
quality gemstones.
In fact, most of the gems that we have
<clr:0000>originally<clr:ffff> came from <clr:0000>Death Mountain<clr:ffff>.

<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_00>I think once the <clr:0000>Demon King<clr:ffff> has been
defeated and my job here is done, I might
head there...
BlackZelda_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>So the telescope lets you see things
that are really, really far away. Or it
should, anyway.
All I see when I look through it is the bell
at the center of Hyrule Castle...
Talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>If you're looking for gems, I hear <clr:0000>Goron
City<clr:ffff>, up near Death Mountain, is a great
source for ones that aren't too pricey.
Curious how I know about this? Well,
we Gerudo have a sharp eye for
quality gemstones.
In fact, most of the gems that we have
<clr:0000>originally<clr:ffff> came from <clr:0000>Death Mountain<clr:ffff>.

<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS>I never thought I'd see the mountain with
my own eyes though. I'm glad I'm
stationed here.
